mapper.insert: insert into get_content (UUID,page_uuid, get_time, get_statis, key_connent, is_award, number_of_periods, page_address, charset_code, page_connent) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{pageUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{getStatis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyConnent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAward,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numberOfPeriods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{charsetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageConnent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update get_content set page_uuid = #{pageUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_award = #{isAward,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, key_connent = #{keyConnent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number_of_periods = #{numberOfPeriods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select UUID, page_uuid, get_time, get_statis, key_connent, is_award, number_of_periods, page_address, charset_code, page_connent from get_content where UUID = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT UUID, page_uuid, get_time, get_statis, key_connent, is_award, number_of_periods, page_address, charset_code, "网页内容" AS page_connent FROM get_content GROUP BY UUID DESC
